sentences.en: a racially exclusive hiring policy
sentences.cn: 种族排外的聘用政策

sentences.en: an exclusive girls’ school
sentences.cn: 贵族女子学校

sentences.en: Bel Air is an exclusive suburb of Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 贝莱尔是洛杉矶郊外一处高级住宅区。

sentences.en: He attended Eton, the most exclusive private school in Britain.
sentences.cn: 他上的是伊顿公学，英国最昂贵的私立学校。

sentences.en: He is already a member of Britain's most exclusive club.
sentences.cn: 他已经是英国最高级俱乐部的成员了。

sentences.en: He often goes to the exclusive restaurants.
sentences.cn: 他经常去高级饭馆.

sentences.en: He told the magazine in an exclusive interview: "All my problems stem from drink".
sentences.cn: 他在接受一家杂志社的独家采访时说：“我所有的问题都是饮酒造成的。”

sentences.en: If you pay me ￡ 20, 000, I'll give your paper the story as an exclusive.
sentences.cn: 你如果付给我2万英镑, 我就给你的报纸独家报道这件事.

sentences.en: Many of their cheeses are exclusive to our stores in Britain.
sentences.cn: 在英国，他们生产的奶酪很多只在我们商店出售。

sentences.en: Our group will have exclusive use of a 60-foot boat.
sentences.cn: 我们组将有一条专用的60英尺的船。

sentences.en: Our prices are exclusive of sales tax.
sentences.cn: 我们的价格不包括销售税。

sentences.en: People will always pay top dollar for something exclusive.
sentences.cn: 人们总是会为绝无仅有的东西付出高价。

sentences.en: Skiing weekends cost £58 (exclusive of travel and accommodation).
sentences.cn: 周末滑雪价格为58英镑（不含交通和住宿费）。

sentences.en: Some papers thought they had an exclusive.
sentences.cn: 一些报纸认为自己是独家报道。

sentences.en: The content of a book or document exclusive of prefatory matter, codicils, indexes, or appendices.
sentences.cn: 正文除去序言、补遗 、 索引和附录的书或文献的主要部分.

sentences.en: The hotel charges 6 pounds a day, exclusive of meals.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆一天收六英镑, 不包括饭钱.

sentences.en: The hotel has exclusive access to the beach.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆有通向海滩的专用通道。

sentences.en: The story is exclusive to this newspaper.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸独家报道这个材料.

sentences.en: This bathroom is for the President's exclusive use.
sentences.cn: 这间浴室是总统专用的.

sentences.en: Troll's exclusive, personalized luggage is made to our own exacting specifications in heavy-duty PVC/nylon.
sentences.cn: 特罗尔专用的、个性化的行李箱是按照我们自己严格的规格要求用耐用聚氯乙烯/尼龙材料定制的。

sentences.en: Tune in to our exclusive coverage of Wimbledon.
sentences.cn: 请收看我们对温布尔登网球锦标赛的独家报道。

words.tran_cn: 排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物
排除；排斥；拒绝接纳；逐出
独家新闻；独家经营的项目；排外者

phrases.tran_cn: 总代理人；（外贸）独家代理人
独家销售；专卖；独家交易；独家经营

trans.tran_cn: 独有的，高档的，排外的，不含…的
trans.tran_en: available or belonging only to particular people, and not shared
an important or exciting story that is printed in only one newspaper, because that newspaper was the first to find out about it
